name: Black Tea
description: A robust and flavorful tea with a strong, full-bodied taste. Perfect for a morning boost or an afternoon pick-me-up.

name: Green Tea
description: A light and refreshing tea with a subtle, grassy flavor. Known for its numerous health benefits and antioxidants.

name: Butterfly Pea Tea
description: A unique tea with a striking blue color that changes to purple with a splash of lemon. Mild, earthy taste with a hint of floral notes.

name: Hibicus Tea
description: A vibrant, tart tea with a rich red color. Enjoyed both hot and cold, it's known for its tangy flavor and potential health benefits.
